categories: Category:Civilian officials of the Chiss Ascendancy

nodes.text: Xodlak'ji'iprip, core name Lakjiip, was a Chiss female of the Xodlak family who served as a Senior Aide to Councior Xodlak'uvi'vil on the planet Celwis. She and Lakuviv were caught up in Haplif of Agbui's scheme to draw the Chiss Ascendancy into a civil war.

Lakjip visited an Agbui settlement on the supposedly nyix-rich Agbui mining world of Hoxim, leading Lakuviv to plot to try to claim the planet for the Xodlak family. Lakuviv and Lakjip believed that acquiring the mining world for the Xodlak would enhance the Xodlak family's status enough to allow it to rejoin the Nine Ruling Families and advance their careers.
